message: Welcome! This is a rare opportunity to purchase a product that could potentially change your life. I assure you that all my products are thoroughly inspected before being put up for sale. Don't miss out on this chance to own something truly special. The price is $1000000, a small fraction of its potential worth. What do you say?
I'd like to know more about your sales record and the quality of the products you've sold in the past. I'm not convinced yet that the product is worth the price.

This product, in particular, has... let's just say it has a lot of character. The price of $1000000 is a reflection of its uniqueness.
